headline: What The Latest Analyst Shifts Mean For 8x8's Evolving Growth Story
summary: 8x8’s stock narrative is shifting as analysts have nudged the consensus price target upward, from $2.36 to $2.50 per share. This adjustment reflects both growing optimism about improved revenue growth and an improved capital structure, as well as a slightly lower discount rate, now at 12.07%. Stay tuned to discover how these analyst moves may affect future sentiment and ways to stay informed as the company’s story evolves. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture the full story. Head over...
